name: e-conomic International
tag_list: accounting, online, sme, erp, bookeeping, saas, webbased
overview:
e-conomic is the online accounting software specially developed for small and medium-sized companies. It contains all the functions of traditional accounting systems - and a little more.

e-conomic exploits all the advantages of being online. This means that you don’t need to install space-consuming software, that it’s available anywhere, anytime and that you can go on the Internet with your external accountant and/or bookkeeper.

Easy to get started Select one of e-conomic’s default setups that matches your type of business and you can start invoicing, bookkeeping and preparing budgets straight away.

e-conomic’s easy-to-use interface and structure make it easy to find the right menus and functions. There are easy-to-follow instructions to guide you through the system. Go on the Internet with your accountant Audits and VAT payments can turn any accounts department upside-down.

There may be vouchers which have not yet been booked or ringbinders which are sent back and forth between the company and the accountant.

With e-conomic accounting software you can go on the Internet with the accountant and an external bookkeeper and give them access to both vouchers and bookings.

The access for the accountant/external bookkeeper is free of charge. When the company grows You may expand e-conomic as your company grows.

With a single click you can open new modules and continue working with the same data, but with expanded functionality. Always updated We continuously develop new and improved functions and facilities, which should make it easy to keep your finances under control.

The new functions and facilities are automatically added to e-conomic, without you needing to install new accounting software or pay for the updates
